field.name: activity_asset
field.label: Asset
field.description: Optionally input the comma separated assets for this activity. Asset determines activity location (e.g. global.cars, profile.[user_id], profile.%). Use a wildcard of % to match anything starting at and after the wildcard. Leave blank for profile activity based off the viewing user (e.g. profile.[user_id]). Additionally substitutions are supported (e.g. profile.[user_id].cars) in addition to custom [viwer_id] and [page_id]. The following custom assets can also be used: global, profile, connections, connectionsonly, self, self.connections, self.connectionsonly, user, user.connections, user.connectionsonly, displayed, displayed.connections, and displayed.connectionsonly.

field.name: activity_direction
field.label: Direction
field.description: Select what direction posts should load. If up then newest posts will be displayed at the bottom. If down then newest posts will be displayed at the top.

field.name: activity_auto_update
field.label: Auto Update
field.description: Enable or disable automatically updating the stream with newest entries. Note this is done at set intervals and will prepend new entries at the beginning of the stream based off the timestamp of the most recent entry.

field.name: activity_auto_load
field.label: Auto Load
field.description: Enable or disable automatically loading in the next page. Note this is done at set intervals and will only load in the next page if the more button is visible during its check.

field.name: activity_pinned
field.label: Pinned
field.description: Enable or disable display of pinned posts. When enabled pinned posts will always display at the top of the stream. When disabled pinned posts will display normally as if it was never pinned.

field.name: activity_create
field.label: Create
field.description: Enable or disable creation of new posts.

field.name: activity_create_access
field.label: Create Access
field.description: Select post create access. Access determines who can post a new message. Moderators are exempt from this configuration unless disabled.

field.name: activity_create_connected
field.label: Create Connected Access
field.description: Enable or disable connected create access. This checks if the viewing user is connected to the post owner or stream owner. This is in addition to Create Access. If disabled only Create Access will be used to determine posting permission.

field.name: activity_message_limit
field.label: Message Limit
field.description: Input maximum number of characters a message can have. If 0 allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

field.name: activity_collapsed
field.label: Collapsed
field.description: Enable or disable collapsing of new post textarea and its buttons.

field.name: activity_paging
field.label: Paging
field.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

field.name: activity_paging_first_limit
field.label: Page First Limit
field.description: Input first page limit. First Page limit determines how many rows are displayed on the first page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed. Set to 0 for no limit.

field.name: activity_paging_limit
field.label: Page Limit
field.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many rows are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed. Set to 0 for no limit.

field.description: Select what direction posts should load. If up then newest posts will be displayed at the bottom. If down then newest posts will be displayed at the top.

field.name: comments_replies_pinned
field.label: Pinned
field.description: Enable or disable display of pinned posts. When enabled pinned posts will always display at the top of the stream. When disabled pinned posts will display normally as if it was never pinned.

field.name: comments_replies_create
field.label: Create
field.description: Enable or disable creation of new posts.

field.name: comments_replies_create_access
field.label: Create Access
field.description: Select post create access. Access determines who can post a new message. Moderators are exempt from this configuration unless disabled.

field.name: comments_replies_create_connected
field.label: Create Connected Access
field.description: Enable or disable connected create access. This checks if the viewing user is connected to the post owner or stream owner. This is in addition to Create Access. If disabled only Create Access will be used to determine posting permission.

field.name: comments_replies_message_limit
field.label: Message Limit
field.description: Input maximum number of characters a message can have. If 0 allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

field.name: comments_replies_collapsed
field.label: Collapsed
field.description: Enable or disable collapsing of new post textarea and its buttons.

field.name: comments_replies_paging
field.label: Paging
field.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

field.name: comments_replies_paging_first_limit
field.label: Page First Limit
field.description: Input first page limit. First Page limit determines how many rows are displayed on the first page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed. Set to 0 for no limit.

field.name: comments_replies_paging_limit
field.label: Page Limit
field.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many rows are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed. Set to 0 for no limit.

field.name: comments_replies_parser_substitutions
field.label: Substitutions
field.description: Enable or disable parsing of messages for substitutions.

field.name: comments_replies_parser_emotes
field.label: Emotes
field.description: Enable or disable parsing of messages for emote substitutions.

field.name: comments_replies_parser_profiles
field.label: Profile URLs
field.description: Enable or disable parsing of messages for @user_id and @username profile links

field.name: comments_replies_parser_links
field.label: Links
field.description: Enable or disable parsing of messages for URLs into clickable links.

field.name: comments_replies_parser_prepare
field.label: Prepare Content
field.description: Enable or disable parsing of messages for Joomla content.prepare usages.

field.name: comments_replies_actions
field.label: Actions
field.description: Enable or disable usage of actions. Actions help determine what the person is doing or what their current emotional state is at the time of posting.

field.name: comments_replies_actions_message_limit
field.label: Message Limit
field.description: Input maximum number of characters a action message can have. If 0 allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

field.name: comments_replies_actions_include
field.query: SELECT `id` AS value, `value` AS text FROM `#__comprofiler_plugin_activity_actions` ORDER BY `ordering`
field.label: Include
field.description: Optionally specify what actions are included for selection. Note actions already selected will be unaffected.

field.name: comments_replies_actions_exclude
field.query: SELECT `id` AS value, `value` AS text FROM `#__comprofiler_plugin_activity_actions` ORDER BY `ordering`
field.label: Exclude
field.description: Optionally exclude actions from being selected. Note actions already selected will be unaffected.

field.name: comments_replies_locations
field.label: Locations
field.description: Enable or disable usage of locations. Locations help clarify where a post was physically made.

field.name: comments_replies_locations_address_limit
field.label: Address Limit
field.description: Input maximum number of characters a location address can have. If 0 allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

field.name: comments_replies_locations_include
field.query: SELECT `id` AS value, `value` AS text FROM `#__comprofiler_plugin_activity_locations` ORDER BY `ordering`
field.label: Include
field.description: Optionally specify what locations to include for selection. Note locations already selected will be unaffected.

field.name: comments_replies_locations_exclude
field.query: SELECT `id` AS value, `value` AS text FROM `#__comprofiler_plugin_activity_locations` ORDER BY `ordering`
field.label: Exclude
field.description: Optionally exclude locations from being selected. Note locations already selected will be unaffected.

field.name: comments_replies_links
field.label: Links
field.description: Enable or disable usage of links. Links make it easy to attach images, photos, videos, music, and even websites to a post.

field.name: comments_replies_links_embedded
field.label: Embedded Links
field.description: Enable or disable parsing of embedded URLs to links. Embedded URLs are URLs supplied directly in a message.

field.name: comments_replies_links_link_limit
field.label: Link Limit
field.description: Input maximum number of links a post can have. Set to 0 for unlimited links. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

field.name: comments_replies_links_file_extensions
field.label: Link File Extensions
field.description: Input a comma separated list of file extensions to be parsed as file links. File links attempt to parse out relevant download information like modify date, file size, and extension.

field.name: comments_replies_tags
field.label: Tags
field.description: Enable or disable usage of tags. Tags help determine who the user is with at time of posting.

field.name: comments_replies_likes
field.label: Likes
field.description: Enable or disable usage of likes.

field.name: comments_replies_likes_include
field.query: SELECT `id` AS value, `value` AS text FROM `#__comprofiler_plugin_activity_like_types` ORDER BY `ordering`
field.label: Include
field.description: Optionally specify what types to include for selection. Note types already selected will be unaffected.

field.name: comments_replies_likes_exclude
field.query: SELECT `id` AS value, `value` AS text FROM `#__comprofiler_plugin_activity_like_types` ORDER BY `ordering`
field.label: Exclude
field.description: Optionally exclude types from being selected. Note types already selected will be unaffected.

field.name: following_asset
field.label: Asset
field.description: Optionally input the comma separated assets to follow. Asset determines what stream will be followed (e.g. global.cars, profile.[user_id], profile.%). Use a wildcard of % to match anything starting at and after the wildcard. Leave blank to follow the page by Itemid (e.g. page.[page_id]). Additionally substitutions are supported (e.g. profile.[user_id].cars, module.[module_id], page.[page_id]) in addition to custom [displayed_id], [viewer_id], [module_id], and [page_id]. The following custom assets can also be used: global, profile, following, followingonly, likes, likesonly, connections, connectionsonly, self, self.connections, self.connectionsonly, self.following, self.followingonly, self.likes, self.likesonly, user, user.connections, user.connectionsonly, user.following, user.followingonly, user.likes, user.likesonly, displayed, displayed.connections, displayed.connectionsonly, displayed.following, displayed.followingonly, displayed.likes, and displayed.likesonly.

field.name: following_count
field.label: Count
field.description: Enable or disable the display of the follower count. Clicking the follower count will display a list of users following the asset.

field.name: following_connected
field.label: Connected
field.description: Enable or disable connected check. This checks if the viewing user is connected to the asset (e.g. in cases of profile.USER_ID) or stream owner. This is in addition to registered user access check. If disabled only registered user access check will be used to determine following permission. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

field.name: likes_asset
field.label: Asset
field.description: Optionally input the comma separated assets to like. Asset determines what stream will be liked (e.g. global.cars, profile.[user_id], profile.%). Use a wildcard of % to match anything starting at and after the wildcard. Leave blank to like the page by Itemid (e.g. page.[page_id]). Additionally substitutions are supported (e.g. profile.[user_id].cars, module.[module_id], page.[page_id]) in addition to custom [displayed_id], [viewer_id], [module_id], and [page_id]. The following custom assets can also be used: global, profile, following, followingonly, likes, likesonly, connections, connectionsonly, self, self.connections, self.connectionsonly, self.following, self.followingonly, self.likes, self.likesonly, user, user.connections, user.connectionsonly, user.following, user.followingonly, user.likes, user.likesonly, displayed, displayed.connections, displayed.connectionsonly, displayed.following, displayed.followingonly, displayed.likes, and displayed.likesonly.

field.name: likes_count
field.label: Count
field.description: Enable or disable the display of the likes count. Clicking the likes count will display a list of users who liked the asset.

field.name: likes_include
field.query: SELECT `id` AS value, `value` AS text FROM `#__comprofiler_plugin_activity_like_types` ORDER BY `ordering`
field.label: Include
field.description: Optionally specify what types to include for selection. Note types already selected will be unaffected.

field.name: likes_exclude
field.query: SELECT `id` AS value, `value` AS text FROM `#__comprofiler_plugin_activity_like_types` ORDER BY `ordering`
field.label: Exclude
field.description: Optionally exclude types from being selected. Note types already selected will be unaffected.
